alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 2:46PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN HARRISON COUNTY THROUGH 315 PM CDT... At 245 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Long Beach, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Long Beach, Lyman, and Gulfport Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 21 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized ponding of water in roadways and other low lying and poor drainage areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
